Title: 68786-EM-Add/Maintain Candidate-New Candidate registration with Non-registered Voter

Step Action: Navigate to Election Management->Candidates->Search Candidates
Step Expected:
Search Candidates screen must be displayed 
 successfully

Step Action: Enter the Last Name and click on the "Search"
Step Expected:
Search results must be displayed 
 successfully

Step Action: Click on "Add"
Step Expected: Add new Candidate screen must be displayed

Step Action: Click on "Use entered search criteria"
Step Expected:
Maintain Candidate screen must be displayed 
 successfully

Step Action: Enter all the mandatory fields and click on Save button
Step Expected:
Candidate added successfully message must be 
 displayed

Step Action: Click on the "Search"
Step Expected: User must navigate to Search candidate screen

Step Action: Search with the newly added candidate last name
Step Expected: Corresponding record must be displayed in the search results

Step Action: Click on the Actions "Edit"
Step Expected: Maintain Candidate screen must be displayed successfully

Step Action: Verify Party drop down is removed from Election & Office section
Step Expected: Party drop down must be displayed in Candidate information section

Title: EM - Scan Screen Behavior and Button Update

Step Action: Navigate to 'Candidate Search' page
Search for any user
Click on the 'Actions' button
Step Expected: 'Scan' option appears as an action

Step Action: Click the 'Scan' option
Land on the 'Single Scan' page
Step Expected: Verify 'Document Name' is pre-populated with "Election Management". Verify 'Candidate Filing Application number' appears and is populated with the candidate number. Verify' Filing Date' appears and contains the application filing date.

Step Action: Click the 'Document Type' dropdown
Step Expected: Verify The options 'Candidate Affidavit', 'TREASURER FORM', and 'other' appear and can be selected.

Step Action: Navigate to the 'Maintain Candidate' confirmation page
Step Expected: 'Scan' button is available at the bottom of the page beside 'Search'

Step Action: Click 'Scan'
Step Expected: Land on 'Single Scan' page.

Title: 78531-EM - Candidates - Search Candidate - Add district search field to search candidate Page

Step Action: Navigate to  EM -Candidates - Search Candidate Page
Step Expected: Search Candidate Page must be displayed

Step Action: Verify District drop down is added to the search fields
Step Expected: District drop down must be added to the Search Candidate Page

Step Action:
Select a district from the "District" drop down and
click "Search"
Step Expected: Corresponding records must be displayed

Step Action: Add a new district in the District Management module
Step Expected:
Added district must displayed in the "District"
dropdown on Search Candidate Page

Title: EM - Candidate - View Election Management Documents

Step Action: Navigate to the 'Search Candidate' screen: EM > Candidates > Search Candidates
Step Expected: Land on the 'Search Candidate' screen

Step Action: Wildcard search OR search for a specific user
Step Expected: Candidate(s) appear in the list

Step Action: Click 'Actions' menu
Step Expected: 'Edit', 'Delete', and 'View/Scan' appear as actions

Step Action: Click 'View/Scan'
Step Expected: Land on the 'Candidate Documents' page. 'Document Name', 'Date of Upload', and 'Actions' appear as grid items.

Step Action: Click 'Scan'
Step Expected: Land on the 'View Candidate Registration' page

Step Action: Choose to 'Start New Scan' OR 'Load Local File', and select a scan/file to add to the index.
Step Expected: File appears in the 'Scanned Documents' Index

Step Action: Click 'Upload Documents'
Step Expected: File is successfully uploaded and notification is received.

Step Action: Navigate back to the 'Candidate Documents' page
Step Expected: All uploaded documents are displayed in the list

Step Action: Click 'Actions' for any uploaded document
Step Expected: 'View' and 'Delete' appear as actions.

Step Action: Click 'View'
Step Expected: The correct document is displayed in popup/modal

Step Action: Close the popup/modal

Click 'Actions' , then 'Delete'
(Delete not yet implemented on 10-17, but will be in future)
Step Expected:
The document is able to be deleted
(Update this step with function/notification once impemented)
